loadBMP :: CString -> IO (Ptr Surface)
loadBMP file = do
	rw <- withCString "rb" $ rwFromFile file
	loadBMP_RW rw 1

saveBMP :: Ptr Surface -> CString -> IO CInt
saveBMP surface file = do
	rw <- withCString "wb" $ rwFromFile file
	saveBMP_RW surface rw 1
